Header: TWO BROTHERS ARRESTED FOR STEALING MONEY PLACED UNDER PROBATION
Content: Galle Chief Magistrate Harshana Kekunwela today ordered two underage brothers to be placed under probation office for being involved in racket of stealing money and belongings of the people visiting Galle. The two brothers, aged 15 and 12, have been ordered to be sent to Kitulampitiya Children's Home. The police said that the mother of the two students has died and they were living with their father.
